message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I think a 60/40 split is more fair, considering I'm taking the risk of rejecting your offer.  Let's see if you agree.
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I still think 50/50 is fair. Your turn to decide!
I'm still confident that a 65/35 split is more fair given the risks involved.  Let's see if we can reach a compromise.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I think 55/45 is the maximum I'm willing to go. Your turn to decide!
Time is running out, and the value of the money is decreasing. I'm offering a 70/30 split. It's my final offer, let's end this now.
I'm not going to give in to your demands, Bob. I'm willing to take a risk and hold out for a better deal. Your turn to decide!
Alice, we're getting closer to the end. I'm offering a 75/25 split, it's our last chance to get anything at all.  Let's make a deal.
I'm not giving up yet, Bob. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give in completely. Your turn to decide!
